nodes.text: Drepplin was the capital city of the planet Glova. It was used as a starport.

The town of Drepplin was a very small port city, and as such, was a bit rough and tumble. It was founded when the colony was established, and it remained the capital of the planet. Due to the limited population on the planet, it also served as the planet's only spaceport.

The Government House was built out of an old plantation house, built by one of the original settlers.
Most of the buildings in the city were ramshackle constructs and the outer spaceport area is also a low-budget affair - there was simple marked lots for starships, with only refueling and the most limited of repair services.
Drepplin Street was the main road, and it was a collection of various establishments where products of every nature would be found.
